povexport
Class PovExporter

java.lang.Object
  povexport.PovExporter

public class PovExporter
extends java.lang.Object

This is the setup class for RawPovray that does the real work, revised version briefly flirted with command line options for their versatility, but I now very much favour use of an ini file...

          Interface to RawPovray as a String

storeSettings

public void storeSettings()
Current settings are stored to the properties file, since PovWriter/etc use the stored settings when available, this function should always be called, if you want to change runtime settings (not just to store settings).

createIniFile

public void createIniFile(java.lang.String name,
                          Quality quality)
The ini file stores the PovRAY raytrace options

Parameters:
name - path of ini file
quality -

createIniFile

public void createIniFile(java.lang.String dataPath)
The ini file stores the PovRAY raytrace options With a default of quality medium

Parameters:
dataPath -

writeIniFile

public void writeIniFile()
The ini file is a small file that sets the quality of ray-tracing, but you can use custom declares to set scaling, translations etc.

sphere

@Deprecated
public void sphere(float radius)
Deprecated. 

Draw a better sphere for processing that is better suited to PovRAY export, possibly not required for processing 2.0

Parameters:
radius - float the detail is governed by size of the Sphere
